meanings.definition: A person who eats heartily or with great appetite.
meanings.sent1: The trenchermen at the party enjoyed the delicious food.
meanings.sent2: The trenchermen finished all the food at the buffet.
meanings.sent3: The trenchermen were so hungry, they even ate the decorations!
meanings.sent4: She was a trencherman when it came to devouring books, finishing one after another.
meanings.sent5: The image of trenchermen feasting at the banquet lingered in his mind.

meanings.definition: Plural form of trencherman: people who eat heartily or with great appetite.
meanings.sent1: The trenchermen gathered around the table, eager to start their meal.
meanings.sent2: In the restaurant, the trenchermen ordered a variety of dishes to share.
meanings.sent3: The trenchermen's enthusiasm for food was contagious, making everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The group of trenchermen devoured the pizza like a pack of hungry wolves.
meanings.sent5: The sight of trenchermen enjoying their feast was a true spectacle.
